songs.title: Ridin’ On Dat Pole
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
How she ridin' on dat pole make a nigga wanna come and put this pole in her
'Cause she drop it to the floor girl you know girl you know you's a go-getter
How she's ridin' on this pole make me wanna take it off and explode in her
Now she leaving from ?

[Verse 1]
See she one


The way she riding the pole, make me wanna put this pole in her
